hero_text:
I build digital products
that drive your business growth,
combining innovative design and robust development
services_subtitle: At the intersection of logic and creativity
services_text: I build secure, high-performance full-stack apps with smooth UX to drive growth and efficiency.
service_1_desc: I build fast, secure, and scalable digital foundations. My full-stack development ensures robust architecture, peak performance, and seamless integrations for long-term success.
service_2_desc: I build applications that are fast and secure by design. I eliminate bottlenecks and strengthen security with OAuth and XSS/SQLI protections, ensuring a reliable and scalable experience.
service_3_desc: A poor user experience ruins the best idea. Design and develop intuitive and visually impeccable web and mobile applications (React Native/Flutter) that your users will love.
about_subtitle: Cod with purpose, Built to scale
about_text_2:
Chilean-born full-stack developer with a background in design and illustration, blending technical precision with creative vision to craft exceptional user experiences.
Focus: Scalable full-stack solutions, clean architecture, and efficient code that aligns with business goals.
Values: Collaboration, independence, and a passion for continuous learning.
Beyond code: Cycling, team sports, and exploring indie games to inspire new UX ideas.
works_text: Selected projects where technical precision and vision come together to generate tangible impact and measurable results
project_1_name: ElderWizz AI - Code Assistant and Programming Mentor
project_1_desc: ElderWizz AI is an interactive web application designed to help developers improve the quality of their code.
project_2_desc: An online store specializing in creative and handmade items with a clean and easy-to-use interface.
project_3_desc: An e-commerce platform for Anime products and accessories with offers and category filtering.
project_4_desc: Static personal portfolio that presents projects, skills and a creative touch through interactive graphics and animations.
project_5_desc: A curated collection of designer home decor items, including furniture and artisan vases.
project_6_desc: A modern, responsive, and attractive landing page for a fictional gym named FitPro.
contact_summary_phrase: Orchestrating digital atoms around a core of pure logic.
contact_text:
Ready to grow your business?
Let's build your app together
